notes: [Improved] Updated editor to version 2.9.1 along with the plugin version.
[Improved] Updated editor to version 2.9.0 along with the plugin version.
[Improved] Updated editor to version 2.8.5 along with the plugin version.
[Fixed] Adding code-view plugin to enabled plugins when allowed to see code (permissions)
[Fixed] Comparing enabled plugins regarding core plugins
[Fixed] Bug loading Craft integrations when Enabled Plugins setting is set to something else than 'All'.
[Fixed] Issue regarding encoded contents (ie. referenced tags).
[Fixed] Capturing custom CSS file type switch case.
[Fixed] Custom CSS field name to save settings correctly.
[Improved] Fixed issue with updating a file link and the Link update popup window.
[Improved] Fixed issue regarding inserting a file link with correct Craft's Asset referenced-tag {asset:<id>}.
[Improved] Updated editor to version 2.8.4 along with the plugin version.
[Improved] Updated editor to version 2.8.3 along with the plugin version.
[Improved] Updated editor to version 2.8.2 along with the plugin version.
[Improved] Fixed setting plugin's schema version.
[Fixed] Issue regarding loading the right Froala library based on the version number.
[Fixed] Missed version number update in plugin file.
[Added] Permission to grant users or groups to toggle HTML code view (not admins only).
[Fixed] Issue regarding loading enabled-plugin values based on the library & core plugins.
[Improved] Removed code view option via plugin settings (since it's a permission now).
[Improved] Removed custom css settings from field. Use globally plugin setting instead (compatible with Craft 3 version).
[Fixed] Fixed issue reqarding disabling enabled plugins.
[Fixed] Fixed hitting control/cmd+s when editor is focused and saving the element.
[Fixed] Support for passing Craft's target language as editor language (if exists).
[Fixed] Setting editor configurations only if not already defined by configuration file.
[Fixed] Styling toolbar separator causing button to appear on the right.
[Fixed] Fixed reading html purifier json-config files.
[Fixed] Moved back field-type behavior methods from field-service.
[Added] Support for using custom config (json) files.
[Added] Support for using Asset sources for custom CSS FIle.
[Added] Support for using HTML purifier.
[Improved] Using editable-table for custom css classes (previous data is migrated!).
[Improved] Updated integration javascript to be compatible with Craft 3 plugin.
[Improved] Updated Froala Editor from v2.7.0 to v2.8.1
[Added] Composer support for Craft 2. Using composer installers package.
[Added] Ability to make a custom CSS file to be a plugin resource
[Improved] Using Froala Editor version for the plugin version
[Improved] Updated Froala Editor from v2.4.1 to v2.7.0 (thank to @Rias500)
[Fixed] Enabled plugins passed as lower camelcase names instead of underscored.
[Improved] Updated Froala Editor from v2.4.0 to v2.4.1.
[Added] Support for custom CSS classes and stylesheet file (plugin-wide and per field setting).
[Added] Custom theme to make editr in style of Craft CMS.
[Fixed] Database column type set to TEXT instead of VARCHAR. Will be fixed for fields after update (migration).
[Added] Documentation URL
[Fixed] Edit existing link in edito via Craft's link entry modal
[Fixed] Replacing images in editor opens Craft's Asset modal again [#1 theskyfloor]
[Added] Added support for using image transforms in image replace modal [#3 lboaretto]
[Added] Support for control + save to save the entry
[Added] Updated Froala Editor to v2.4.0
[Added] Initial release
